edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext

Class IVCiphertext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext.IVCiphertext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SymmetricCiphertext, java.io.Serializable

    public class IVCiphertext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a container for cipher-texts that include actual cipher data and the IV used. This is a concrete decorator in the Decorator Pattern used for Symmetric Ciphertext.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IVCiphertext(SymmetricCiphertext cipher, byte[] iv)
      Constructs a container for Ciphertexts that need an IV.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IVCiphertext

        public IVCiphertext(SymmetricCiphertext cipher,
            byte[] iv)
        Constructs a container for Ciphertexts that need an IV.
        Parameters:
        cipher - symmetric ciphertext to which we need to add an IV.
        iv - the IV we need to add to the ciphertext.
